      • applyWithMask

        public ij.ImagePlus applyWithMask(ij.ImagePlus imagePlusInput)
        Method used to scan the deconvolved image, and the image having undergone the filter min in the binary mask of nucleus. For each voxel, the user can determine if the voxel value is a minima or belong to a minima region. All the minima regions retain a specific voxel value while the others => value = 0
        Parameters:
        imagePlus - Image to be processed
        Returns:
        minima regions

      • computeImageMoreOne

        Adds one at all the voxel values of a given image
